channel.title: • CuStOm MaGiC aTtAcKs™ •
channel.description:
[center]• [b]CuStOm MaGiC aTtAcKs™[/b] •
I've taken an enormous amount of time to create this topic. I think that it's a great experience for me and others. This topic is a kind of business, it allows you to choose a default graphic and animation. You can choose between a list of graphics and animations listed below. You need to then post the details using the correct layout.
• [b]ThE lAyOuT[/b] •
[b]Name:[/b] [i]Your forum name.[/i] [b]Name Of Spell:[/b] [i]Your desired name of your spell.[/i] [b]Graphic One:[/b] [i]A graphic.[/i] [b]Graphic Two:[/b] [i]A graphic.[/i] [b]Graphic Three:[/b] [i]A graphic.[/i] [b]Animation:[/b] [i]An animation.[/i] [b]Magic Slot:[/b] [i]Strike, bolt or wave.[/i] [b]Tested:[/b] [i]Tested before given.[/i]
• [b]ThE lAyOuT cOdE[/b] •
[code][b]Name:[/b] [i]Your forum name.[/i] [b]Name Of Spell:[/b] [i]Your desired name of your spell.[/i] [b]Graphic One:[/b] [i]A graphic.[/i] [b]Graphic Two:[/b] [i]A graphic.[/i] [b]Graphic Three:[/b] [i]A graphic.[/i] [b]Animation:[/b] [i]An animation.[/i] [b]Magic Slot:[/b] [i]Strike, bolt or wave.[/i] [b]Tested:[/b] [i]Tested before given.[/i][/code]
• [b]GrApHiCs[/b] •
Tripple dragon breath. Single dragon breath. White breath. Green breath. Whirlpool. Giant log. Rocks falling. Bull roarer. Red spikes. Big puff of smoke. Black and blue fire. Fireworks. Ogre arrow. Birds above head. Small stars. Green puff of smoke. Big rock flying. Kalphite jaw. Kalphite magic. Dark flames of zamorak. Green blow. Black birds. Torargs special. Ahrims special. Karils special. Old man spell. Fire. Pink blast. Explosion.
• [b]AnImAtIoNs[/b] •
Dance. Yes. No. Clap. Cooking. Smithing. Blow glass. Crawling. Climbing. A boom. Picklock. Jump fence. Drill demon. Punch kick. Dragon axe special. Dharoks. Torargs. Ahrim. Karils. Veracs. Iban staff. Teleother. Skipping. Cheer. Wave. Whirlpool. Flying. Teleport. Crumble. Guthans. Yo-yo. Zombie head.
• [b]StAtUs - OnLiNe[/b] •
• [b]ThAnKyOu - SlIvIoN[/b] •
• [b]ReWaRdS aCcEpTeD =][/b] •

@Slivion wrote:

[center]• CuStOm MaGiC aTtAcKs™ •

I’ve taken an enormous amount of time to create this topic. I think that it’s a great experience for me and others. This topic is a kind of business, it allows you to choose a default graphic and animation. You can choose between a list of graphics and animations listed below. You need to then post the details using the correct layout.

• ThE lAyOuT •

Name: Your forum name.
Name Of Spell: Your desired name of your spell.
Graphic One: A graphic.
Graphic Two: A graphic.
Graphic Three: A graphic.
Animation: An animation.
Magic Slot: Strike, bolt or wave.
Tested: Tested before given.
